channel.title: bitbucket on Alfred Nutile
channel.description: Recent content in bitbucket on Alfred Nutile

item.title: Bitbucket Pipeline
item.description: BitBucket has a nice feature call Pipelines https://bitbucket.org/product/features/pipelines for $0 you can, even for private repos have a decent CI flow. Private repos CI Pipeline $0!! It took a bit to get going though since the docs do not talk about PHP and MySQL in enough details. Here is what I ended up with for a bitbucket-pipelines.yml # This is a sample build configuration for PHP. # Check our guides at https://confluence.
